languages.text: "Это наша церковь, в ней мы молимся Императору, держащему Ключ всех Судеб. Колокол на башне умеет звенеть так, что закладывает уши!"
"This is our chapel where we pray to the Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies. The bell in its tower can ring so loud, it makes your ears pop!"
languages.original_text: "Это наша церковь, в ней мы молимся Императору, держащему Ключ всех Судеб. Колокол на башне умеет звенеть так, что закладывает уши!"

traits.locale_text: "This is our church where we pray to the Emperor, Him that Holdeth the Key to All Destinies. The magical mechanism in its spire can ring so loud, your ears pop!"
"This is our church where we pray to the Emperor, Him that Holdeth the Key to All Destinies. The magical mechanism in its spire can ring so loud, your ears pop!"
"This is our church where we pray to the Emperor, Him that Holdeth the Key to All Destinies. The magical mechanism in its spire can ring so loud, it makes your ears pop!"
"This is our church where we pray to the Emperor, Him that Holdeth the Key to All Destinies. The magical mechanism in its spire can ring so loud, it makes your ears pop!"
"This is our chapel where we pray to the Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies. The bell in its tower can ring so loud, it makes your ears pop!"
"This is our chapel where we pray to the Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies. The bell in its tower can ring so loud, it makes your ears pop!"

languages.text: 「ここは礼拝堂です。すべての運命の鍵をお持ちの皇帝陛下に祈りを捧げる場所よ。塔の上の鐘は、とんでもない音で鳴るんですよ！耳がキーンとなるくらいにね！」
languages.original_text: "This is our chapel where we pray to the Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies. The bell in its tower can ring so loud, it makes your ears pop!"

traits.locale_text: 「ここは礼拝堂です。すべての運命の鍵をお持ちの皇帝陛下に祈りを捧げる場所よ。塔の上の鐘は、とんでもない音で鳴るんですよ！耳がキーンとなるくらいにね！」

languages.text: "Bu şapelde Tüm Kaderlerin Anahtarını Elinde Tutan İmparator'a dualar ederiz. Kuledeki çan öyle yüksek çalar ki insanı sağır eder!"
languages.original_text: "This is our chapel where we pray to the Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies. The bell in its tower can ring so loud, it makes your ears pop!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu şapelde İmparator'a, Tüm Kaderlerin Anahtarını Elinde Tutan'a dualar ederiz. Kuledeki çan öyle yüksek çalar ki insanı sağır eder!"

languages.text: «Esta es la capilla donde rezamos al Emperador, portador de la Llave de todos los Destinos. ¡La campana de la torre hace tanto ruido como para dejarle a uno sordo!».
languages.original_text: "This is our chapel where we pray to the Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies. The bell in its tower can ring so loud, it makes your ears pop!"

traits.locale_text: «Esta es la capilla donde rezamos al Emperador, portador de la Llave de todos los Destinos. ¡La campana de la torre hace tanto ruido como para dejarle a uno sordo!».

languages.text: “这里是我们的礼拜堂，我们就是在这里向万千命运之钥的持有者神皇祈祷。钟塔的钟声非常洪亮，会震得你的耳朵嗡嗡响！”
languages.original_text: "This is our chapel where we pray to the Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies. The bell in its tower can ring so loud, it makes your ears pop!"

traits.locale_text: “这里是我们的礼拜堂，我们就是在这里向万千命运之钥的持有者神皇祈祷。钟塔的钟声非常洪亮，会震得你的耳朵嗡嗡响！”

languages.text: « Voici notre chapelle, où nous prions l'Empereur, l'auguste détenteur de la clé de tous les destins. La cloche installée dans cette tour sonne si fort qu'elle pourrait aisément vous crever les tympans ! »
languages.original_text: "This is our chapel where we pray to the Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies. The bell in its tower can ring so loud, it makes your ears pop!"

traits.locale_text: « Voici notre chapelle, où nous prions l'Empereur, l'auguste détenteur de la clé de tous les destins. La cloche installée dans cette tour sonne si fort qu'elle pourrait aisément vous crever les tympans ! »

languages.text: "Das ist unsere Kapelle, in der wir zum Imperator beten, dem Hüter des Schlüssels zu allen Schicksalen. Die Glocke in ihrem Turm ist so laut, dass einem die Trommelfelle platzen."
languages.original_text: "This is our chapel where we pray to the Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies. The bell in its tower can ring so loud, it makes your ears pop!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist unsere Kapelle, in der wir zum Imperator beten, dem Hüter des Schlüssels zu allen Schicksalen. Die Glocke in ihrem Turm ist so laut, dass einem die Trommelfelle platzen."
